game.name: Silent Insanity PT Psychological Trauma
game.description:
Nothing could be scary than being surrounded by a horde of spooky and deadly souls! Oh no! You have found yourself in an unknown place where everything looks weird when you wake up in the morning. Silence is everywhere and you even find it difficulty in hearing the wind behind the windows and the sound of any human being, bird or animal. Would you think that you are able to survive through multiple levels? Join Silent Insanity PT: Psychological Trauma and be prepared to learn how to stand up to your fears!

Your courageous nature and ability to fight would help to survive the horrors around you in this brand new action game. It is common to see things around you are changing automatically and turning into the terribly obscure. You would have no other option rather than going through the building over and over again. It seems that this place has a long history and playing this HTML5 fighting game by the end is the only way to learn about it.

Get ready to protect your psyche and imagination attacked by the intense gameplay! Try to deal with all the obstacles and find the way to escape in all 18 unique and challenging levels! The darkness around you would try to engulf you all the time. Make sure to solve out all of the puzzles to keep your character alive until you achieve your objective. This 3D first-person horror game includes some shades of action, dark atmosphere, and 18 levels of gameplay. You can play this shooter challenge in desktops, and android phones and have fun without download.
